name: Crucible Extension

additionalTooltips.title: [capacity] Capacity
additionalTooltips.description: Units can only be summoned on a floor if it has enough capacity.

cardLoreTooltips: The number of Morsels within the Crucible seems to be endless, making the work they accomplish proceed near instantaneously. Should I need to do future work on the Boneshaker, I will remember to take this into account.
